item.title: The UST and Luna Crash Saga Nears its End as Terra Founder Do Kwon Pleads Guilty
item.description: August 12th: During a hearing in a U.S. court, Terra's founder, Do Kwon, entered a guilty plea to two counts of conspiracy to commit fraud and wire fraud. These charges are related to the previous $40 billion TerraUSD (UST) and Luna collapse.Do Kwon, who was born in Seoul, South Korea in 1991, co-founded Terraform Labs in Singapore in 2018 with others. They launched the algorithmic stablecoin TerraUSD and the governance token Luna, which were once regarded as an innovative benchmark in DeFi. In May 2022, due to algorithmic imbalance, TerraUSD detached from the U.S. dollar, resulting in a sharp decline in the prices of Luna and UST. The market value nearly reached zero, triggering market panic and a chain reaction. This further plunged the crypto market into the abyss of a bear market. Global investors suffered approximately $40 billion in losses, and as a result, Do Kwon was charged with financial fraud.

item.title: Top trader @TheWhiteWhaleHL has claimed the #1 spot on Hyperliquid's 30-day leaderboard with $45.8M in profits.
item.description: Top trader @TheWhiteWhaleHL has claimed the #1 spot on Hyperliquid's 30-day leaderboard with $45.8M in profits. A true bull, he held his positions strong through the market crash a couple of weeks ago. He's still long on $ETH, $SOL, and $HYPE.

item.title: Goldman Sachs: CPI Data Supports Expectation of Fed's 'Insurance' Rate Cut in September
item.description: On August 12th, Alexandra Wilson-Elizondo, the Co-Chief Information Officer for Global Multi-Asset Solutions at Goldman Sachs, declared that the July CPI data met the expectations. The year-on-year core inflation rate increased by 3.1%. The data supported the Fed, which believed that the impact of tariffs on price levels was mostly temporary. Tariffs did not lead to significant price hikes as businesses offset cost pressures by reducing inventory and adjusting prices cautiously. This was mainly because consumers were very price-sensitive. The Fed's policy was highly data-dependent. With inflation under control and signs of a weakening labor market in the revised employment data, future focus would be more on employment. Overall, this inflation report supported the expectation that the Fed might implement an "insurance" interest rate cut in September, and this would be a key driver for the market. (FX678)

item.title: Coinbase Integrates Base Network DEX in Just 3 Days, Base Chain Records Highest DEX Trading Volume Since Early February
item.description: On August 12th, based on BlockWorks data, only three days after Coinbase integrated the DEX of the Base Network into its main application on August 8th, Base witnessed its highest DEX trading volume since early February, reaching approximately $1.9 billion. The top three trading pairs are ETH-USDC, ETH-cbBTC, and cbBTC-USDC.

item.title: Aethir Lowers GPU Staking Threshold to Accelerate AI and Gaming Compute Power Network Expansion
item.description: On August 12th, Aethir announced the first optimization of the core parameter K value. This optimization significantly reduces the Cloud Host staking requirement and is only applicable to new GPU providers. It has no impact on existing node rewards. This move is expected to release more GPU supply, enhance the satisfaction of AI and gaming clients, and drive the network utilization to above 95%. Aethir stated that the new mechanism will reward high-performance and high-utilization GPU nodes, achieving on-demand resource allocation and rewards.The update will take effect automatically on August 14th without the need for user intervention. The goal is to further strengthen Aethir's position as the world's leading decentralized GPU infrastructure.

item.title: Trump: Tariffs Did Not Cause Inflation
item.description: On August 12th, Trump posted on Truth Social and claimed that tariffs did not lead to inflation and that consumers did not even bear those tariffs.

item.title: Aave's Total Value Locked Surpasses $25 Billion, Reaching an All-Time High
item.description: August 12th. Aave made an announcement that its Total Value Locked had exceeded $25 billion and reached a brand new all-time high.

item.title: AguilaTrades closed a 15,000 ETH long position, realizing a profit of approximately $1.47 million.
item.description: On August 12th, as per the monitoring of EmberCN, the contract transaction whale AguilaTrades took a long position of 15,000 ETH at a price of $4,309. It was closed about 20 minutes ago at a price of $4,405, realizing a profit of approximately $1.47 million.

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Genius Group plans to pursue a dual listing in the Asian market
item.description: On August 12th, the U.S.-listed company Genius Group (GNS) declared that the Board of Directors had given the green light to a dual listing on exchanges in Asian markets with the aim of enhancing shareholder value and accessibility.On July 21st, the U.S.-listed company Genius Group announced that it had increased its holdings by 20 bitcoins, raising the total holdings to 200 bitcoins.

item.title: The three major Hyperliquid whales have once again increased their short positions, with a total unrealized loss of over $12 million, exacerbating the liquidation risk.
item.description: On August 12th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight, in the past 2 hours, the three major short-selling whales have continuously increased their positions. As a result, their unrealized losses have been continuously expanding:The whale with an address starting with 0x5d2f44 added $810,000 to its BTC short position. Currently, the unrealized loss is $9.4 million, and the liquidation price is $127,831.The whale with an address starting with 0x49F306 added $850,000 to its ETH short position. Currently, the unrealized loss is $1.08 million, and the liquidation price is $4,615.The whale with an address starting with 0x880ac4 added 28.13 million PUMP tokens to its short position. Currently, the unrealized loss is $2.36 million, and the liquidation price is $0.005.The total unrealized loss of the short positions of the three major whales has exceeded $12.8 million. In the face of market fluctuations, one must be vigilant
